title: Toxic players and how bans work
body: Hey, a few months ago I was playing with toxic players, they said stuff like "hope you get cancer" and various swear words. I was just wondering could they have gotten banned for that and would it be a suspension or a perma ban or if no one reported them would they be banned at all? And would the toxic players have had to have other offenses before they got banned, like would it require several games being toxic. Thanks

replies.body:
It is likely that they will get a chat restriction if enough people report them, and if they continue with their behaviour after the restriction has ended, then the system will look at giving them harsher punishments, like a temporary ban. 

It does take several offences to get a punishment, because while toxic behaviour is horrible and shouldn't be in the game, you cannot always know that person's circumstances irl. They could usually be the most upstanding player, but perhaps today was the day that their GF dumped them, or their cat died, or something else that tipped them over the edge, and that, while unpleasant, is hardly deserving of punishment. We all have bad days.

Some people on the other hand are just unpleasant people, and will continue to offend, and these are the people that will end up with bans and restrictions.

The ban system tries to seperate the people with bad days from the genuine toxic people.

Yeah I completely understand, that makes sense as well. So you can only get perma banned straight away for scripting? Just my friend got perma banned straight away although so it got me thinking can you can perma banned straight away for toxicity or only warnings and if it continues then it's a perma ban. As he was lobbied with friends and they all got perma banned so that got me confused why this happened to him.

Riot has 0 tolerance with scripting, if _(more like when)_ they detect scrips on your account, your account is doomed.

My friend used scripts once in a custom game against a friend as a prank, _(he would never use them in a real game)_ and he received a perma ban as well. 
So there is truly no tolerance for that.

Toxicity is different though, i don't believe you can receive a Perma ban instantly from that.
Ah ok yeah I thought so as well. Do u kno why all 3 of my friends got perma banned at the same time then?
Scripting bans go out in waves to keep them in the dark as to what was detected and when (so they can't try to dodge the detection system).

If you don't report them they will never see punishment.

I just got the glorious pop up telling me that someone I reported got banned.
Love you too Rito. <3
